properties.areaDesc: Northwest Providence; Southeast Middlesex; Eastern Essex
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:58PM EST until January 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5
inches.

* WHERE...In Massachusetts, Eastern Essex MA and Southeast
Middlesex MA Counties. In Rhode Island, Northwest Providence
RI County.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 4 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The bulk of the snowfall is expected to
occur during Saturday evening. Snow is expected to mix with or
change to rain before ending Saturday night.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY
